short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'What Time Is It?' is a very quick and easy to use tool to check the current time in different time zones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "What Time Is It?" takes the user's current time, or an entered time, and converts it to various times from a few other time zones.  This extension is meant to be a lightweight solution for time zone conversion. It also includes conversions for a 24 hour clock.
